question: Who are the top 10 frequent flyers who flew in Q2 2024 that have the most award points?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT ff.frequent_flyer_id, ff.last_name, ff.first_name, ff.award_points
FROM postgres_air.frequent_flyer ff
INNER JOIN postgres_air.account a ON (ff.frequent_flyer_id = a.frequent_flyer_id)
INNER JOIN postgres_air.passenger p ON (a.account_id = p.account_id AND ff.last_name = p.last_name AND ff.first_name = p.first_name)
INNER JOIN postgres_air.boarding_pass bp ON (p.passenger_id = bp.passenger_id)
WHERE bp.boarding_time >= '2024-04-01' AND bp.boarding_time < '2024-07-01'
ORDER BY ff.award_points DESC
LIMIT 10;
